text: Mirjaveh railway station () or Mirjawa railway station is located in Mirjaveh, Iran. It is one of three Pakistan Railways stations in Iran. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Iran * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Iran Category:Railway stations in Pakistan Category:Railway stations on Quetta–Taftan Railway Line
title: Mirjaveh railway station
